suggestions.name: Berry Yogurt Parfait
suggestions.description: A layered parfait with Greek yogurt, fresh berries, and a touch of honey for a protein-rich afternoon snack.
instructions: In a glass, add a layer of Greek yogurt (about 50g)
Add a layer of mixed berries (about 25g)
Repeat with another layer of yogurt and berries
Top with a final layer of yogurt
Drizzle with honey and sprinkle chia seeds on top

suggestions.name: Yogurt Berry Smoothie Bowl
suggestions.description: A thick, creamy smoothie bowl made with frozen berries and yogurt, topped with fresh fruit and granola.
instructions: Add frozen berries, half a banana, and Greek yogurt to a blender
Blend until smooth but still thick (add 1-2 tbsp water if needed)
Top with a few fresh berries and granola

suggestions.name: Latin-Inspired Yogurt Berry Popsicles
suggestions.description: Refreshing frozen yogurt popsicles with a Latin American twist using berries, yogurt, and a hint of lime and honey.
instructions: In a small saucepan, gently boil berries with honey for 3-4 minutes until slightly softened
Remove from heat and let cool for 5 minutes
Blend berries with lime juice until smooth
In a bowl, mix Greek yogurt with half of the berry puree
Pour alternating layers of yogurt mixture and remaining berry puree into popsicle molds
Insert sticks and freeze for at least 4 hours
